thread.section_title: Boy Killed In Florence Hit-And-Run – CBS Los Angeles
thread.title: Boy Killed In Florence Hit-And-Run

author: Ftanyos
title: Boy Killed In Florence Hit-And-Run
text:
FLORENCE (CBSLA.com) – A 5-year-old boy died in a hit-and-run crash in Florence Tuesday night.
The collision occurred at 82nd Street and Towne Avenue, according to a watch commander with Los Angeles police. The victim was transported to a hospital, where he died.
The driver fled the scene. The suspect vehicle was described as a 1990s model green-colored Chevrolet Suburban with tinted windows. It was unclear how many people were inside, the watch commander said.
